name: Orthworm
flavorText: When attacked, this Pokémon will wield the tendrils on its body like fists and pelt the opponent with a storm of punches.

previous.name: Cyclizar
previous.flavorText: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

next.name: Glimmet
next.flavorText: It absorbs nutrients from cave walls. The petals it wears are made of crystallized poison.

pokemon.name: Orthworm
pokemon.flavorText: When attacked, this Pokémon will wield the tendrils on its body like fists and pelt the opponent with a storm of punches.
